game.shortDescription: They Came From Above is a cute Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. Here you have to build an economy and various defense towers to resist hordes of aliens.
game.shortDescriptionEn: They Came From Above is a cute Tower Defense in Lowpoly 3D graphics. Here you have to build an economy and various defense towers to resist hordes of aliens.
